roleset.name: to put a price on something, again

example.name: reprice-v
example.text: A $ 107.03 million offering of Santa Ana Community Redevelopment Agency , Calif. , tax allocation bonds got off to a slow start and may be repriced at lower levels today , according to an official with lead underwriter Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Securities Corp .

propbank.arg: A $ 107.03 million offering of Santa Ana Community Redevelopment Agency , Calif. , tax allocation bonds
according to an official with lead underwriter Donaldson Lufkin & Jenrette Securities Corp

roleset.note: REPRICE-V NOTES: Roleset based on wsj-nw instances. Framed by Claire; comparison to price.01 (from reprice.01-v)
